Andrew Kuzmin

Multidisciplinary self-taught designer and artist with 10+ years of experience. Mostly I do branding, packaging, 3D & AI, motion design, typography and web. Had deal with: Fuck You Digital, GUNNA, Kinopoisk, Lena Kuka, Labelcom, Omsky Studio, Raiffesien Bank, Samokat, Sber, Shuka Design, Tinkoff Bank, Yandex. Job experience: BBDO Branding (Creative Director, 2021—2024), Redday (Art Director, 2018—2021), Logomachine (Graphic Designer, 2014—2016). Contact: kooozmeeen@gmail.com, Instagram, Bēhance, Telegram.

Projects: all, design, visualization, art, 3d, ai, founder.
